abstractText: We assess the status of white sturgeon in the impounded Columbia River Basin upstream of Bonneville Dam. Since 1996, we have marked up to 7,654 white sturgeon during each stock assessment study with passive integrated transponder (PIT) tags. Number of recaptures of these marks has ranged from 56 to 630 fish.This method describes the field sampling plan for data collected duringwhite sturgeon captured during white sturgeon stock assessments.
title: White Sturgeon Stock Assessment Field Data Collection Plan v1.0
